actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to proceed with the planning, designing, engineering, and construction of the Charleston Harbor Deepening Project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to proceed with the planning and construction of the Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, deepening project. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to proceed with the planning, designing, engineering, and construction of the Charleston Harbor Deepening Project.
